snippet.title: DarKnot Trailer
snippet.description:
We've been developing DarKnot, a non-linear horror video game. We are doing our best to make it terribly interesting to play. 
Soon our game will be released in early access. Best support for us is wishlisting DarKnot on Steam. 
Play the free demo version of the DarKnot:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/1371560/DarKnot/?utm_campaign=youtube
DarKnot Team is a new indie game studio, focusing on high level of details and immersion.
We were inspired by Silent Hill, Resident Evil, The Evil Within, Dead By Deadlight and other great horror games.

#indiegames #trailer #indiedev
#UnrealEngine #games #horror 
#silenthill #EvilWithin  #ResidentEvil #DeadbyDaylight
#IndieGamesFestival
#indiedevhour #pitchyagame
